text: @realDonaldTrump Stay tightly focused on nonsense so when you’re blindsided by coronavirus spiking all over the country again we can publish these out of touch comments.  Right now you’ve got your approval rating down to 40% with no idea what you’re doing, but I think you can reach 30% with work
